general_info.summary: This document outlines various programs and departments at Sharda University, including its Schools of Dental, Medical, and Nursing Sciences. It also lists administrative and academic reports such as the Examination Annual Report and Academic Bank of Credits, along with student support services like career counseling, skill enhancement initiatives, and health services. The content also touches upon university governance, tenders, and public relations aspects like FM Radio and global outreach.

career_info.summary: This text outlines potential career paths after a course, mentioning typical salary packages ranging from 3.20 LPA to 4.50 LPA. It also provides a list of links or topics related to recruiters, COVID-19 updates, specific Sharda University campuses, a national cyber crime reporting portal, and an international credit transfer program, all encouraging the reader to take a step towards a career in law.
career_info.raw_content:
Career path you can choose after the course
Students of this programme are placed in companies with an average annual package of 3.20 LPA to 4.50 LPA
Take the next step towards a career in law.
